name: The Collaborate & Dream Series: Jason Carne
description:
It brings me great pleasure to present the ninth installment of the "Collaborate & Dream" project and the first of 2013!

This release focuses on typography. We are surround by it everyday - logos, banners, street signs, etc. That is why I knew Jason Carne was the man to call. Jason works with signs and is one of the most dedicated designers I know. The man bleeds typography and if you don't believe me, he has a clothing brand, Among Villains, and an extensive portfolio to prove it.

When you wear this shirt remember that Jason and I sent emails back and forth for a few weeks. Remember that Jason sketched out every little detail on that shirt. Remember it is a product of creativity. Wear it with pride!

Support:
http://www.amongvillains.com http://www.jasoncarne.com

Sizing Info: 
http://www.americanapparel.net/Sizing/default.asp?chart=mu.shirts

*********************** 
-Printed on American Apparel unisex t-shirts (comfy & stylish).

-Wash in cold water inside out & hang dry (tumble dry low to shrink).

*Personalized thank you notes & surprise goodies come with every order!

-For the latest news on projects: www.ovenfreshdreams.com

name: The Collaborate & Dream Series: Miguel Abreu
description:
Holy Eighth "Collaborate & Dream" installment Batman!

When I was young I remember going to the comic store with my grandmother after helping her bake. I would only get a comic if I helped clean up (not a bad trade off). Comics have always been my gateway to live with superheros. When I passed the idea of creating a comic cover shirt to Miguel he flipped. We both geeked out and got down to business. After a few weeks of comic research, we came up with "The Shinigami Baker"!

Miguel Abreu is an aspiring graphic designer will a real knack for detail. His style is clean, simple, and captivating. It was an honor working with such a talented professional.

P.S. This is only part one of the series. So stay tuned for future releases!

Support:
http://www.miguelabreu.me/

Sizing Info: 
http://www.americanapparel.net/Sizing/default.asp?chart=mu.shirts

*********************** 
-Printed on American Apparel unisex t-shirts (comfy & stylish).

-Wash in cold water inside out & hang dry (tumble dry low to shrink).

*Personalized thank you notes & surprise goodies come with every order!

-For the latest news on projects: www.ovenfreshdreams.com

name: The Collaborate & Dream Series: Gabriel Gozzer (SOLD OUT)
description:
Welcome to the seventh installment of the "Collaborate & Dream" series. 

It brings me great pleasure to present the "Devil's Dozen" t-shirt designed by Gabriel Gozzer. The term devil's dozen was the original name for what is now known as the baker's dozen (13). So when I linked up with Gabriel, we both knew that fusing dark symbolism with a tattoo flair was the only way to go when designing this installment.

Gabriel Gozzer is a talented tattooist out of Portugal. His unique style and attention to detail made our collaboration a very smooth and entertaining one. I could not be happier with the way things turned out.

*********************** 
-Printed on American Apparel unisex t-shirts (comfy & stylish).

-Wash in cold water inside out & hang dry (tumble dry low to shrink).

*Personalized thank you notes & surprise goodies come with every order!

-For the latest news on projects: www.ovenfreshdreams.com

name: The Collaborate & Dream Series: Yema Yema (SOLD OUT)
description:
It is my great pleasure to present the sixth installment of the "Collaborate & Dream" series.

The artistic mind who brought this shirt to life is none other than the talented Yema. She is a mother and a full-time graphic designer/illustrator. I had the pleasure of meeting her through my network of t-shirt buddies and I am forever grateful. Yema's style is fun and youthful, which is why we get along so well. Ever since I started baking under Oven Fresh Dreams, I have felt very "alive" and working with Yema took that feeling a notch further. The art of baking is similar to designing because it allows you to make your dreams into a delicious looking reality!


***********************
-Printed on American Apparel unisex t-shirts (comfy & stylish).

-Wash in cold water inside out & hang dry (tumble dry low to shrink).

*Personalized thank you notes & surprise goodies come with every order!

-For the latest news on projects: www.ovenfreshdreams.com

--> Exclusively with Yema's release: 
-random orders will include a handmade clay chocolate chip cookie keychain or magnet baked (literally) by Gabbi Kosei: http://gabbikosei.bigcartel.com

name: The Collaborate & Dream Series: Nicolo Nimor/Nick Automatic PT. 2 (SOLD OUT)
description:
Welcome to the fifth installment of the "Collaborate & Dream" series. 

This shirt was made possible with the help of the very talented, Nicolo Nimor. He is an amazing person & a great friend of mine. His clothing brand Nick Automatic, is truly something to look out for & having the chance to make my second appearance & be a part of his winter line is a honor!

So grab your shirt today & be a part of an exclusive 35 U.S. & 70+ worldwide wearing a Nick Automatic x Oven Fresh Dreams creation!

name: The Collaborate & Dream Series: Chad Manzo (SOLD OUT)
description:
Welcome to the fourth installment of the "Collaborate & Dream" series. In this edition I teamed up with the  talented Chad Manzo, owner of Scars clothing. We both are sci-fi nerds & hardcore gamers, so our brainstorming sessions turned into this epic Star Wars & Zelda inspired shirt. Only a LIMITED run of 36 shirts were printed!

In a kitchen far, far, away...

Lurks a devilish cupcake that does not want to be frosted. Our hero, Carlos J. EasyBake, is faced with the task of using his trusted spatula to take down "Darth Caker" once & for all!

*This an exclusive presale for friends, family, & fellow dreamers! The shirts go on sale to the public on New Years Eve!

Support:
www.facebook.com/SCARS5COLUMNCREW

Sizing Info:
http://www.americanapparel.net/Sizing/default.asp?chart=mu.shirts

***********************

*Personalized thank you notes & stickers come with every order!

name: The Collaborate & Dream Series: Reuben Levi/Grits Apparel (SOLD OUT)
description:
The wait is over for the third installment of the "Collaborate & Dream" series. This release is code named "Gritty Dreams" & is being in released in TWO colorways. My NYC edition showcases the Knicks iconic colors: orange & blue. Levi's HOU edition will feature the Oilers colorways: red & blue.

So how did it all begin....

Levi (GRITS designer & owner) & I have been good friends for several months now. We met through mutual friends while I living in Houston. We instantly gained respect for each other during one of my weekly dinner parties. The "Gritty Dreams" collaboration shows the connection between the New York City & Houston lifestyles. It also symbolizes the bond I made with Levi & Houston. We are both dreamers, who know how to keep it trill & you can too!

***********************
-Printed on Alstyle unisex t-shirts (comfy & stylish).

-Wash in cold water inside out & hang dry (tumble dry low to shrink).

*Personalized thank you notes & surprise goodies come with every order!

-For the latest news on projects: www.ovenfreshdreams.com

--> Exclusively in the "Gritty Dreams" package:
-stickers
-one of a kind zine (mini magazine) included with fun filled stuff.

name: The Collaborate & Dream Series: Michael Orlando (SOLD OUT)
description:
What's better than a cookie euphoria? An O.F.D. robot destroying it of course! This delicious destruction is limited 25 prints & I am not keeping one, so this was made totally for you. The poster stands at 11''x17'' inches, so it's a good size for any bedroom, living room, or large kitchen.

 Pick up one now & help destroy the competition! 

Designed by: Michael Orlando.

name: The Collaborate & Dream Series: Nicolo Nimor/Nick Automatic (SOLD OUT)
description:
Welcome to the second installment of the "Collaborate & Dream" series. This epic shirt is an animated version of me in my element. Many of you know I love cupcakes of all flavors & sizes, but not many people get to see my rolling pin skills. Consider this a little taste ;). 

This shirt was made possible with the help of the very talented, Nicolo Nimor. He is an amazing person & a great friend of mine. His clothing brand Nick Automatic, is truly something to look out for & having the chance to be a part of summer line is a honor!

So grab your shirt today & be a part of an exclusive 35 U.S. & 60+ worldwide wearing a Nick Automatic x Oven Fresh Dreams creation!

name: The Seal of Dreams (SOLD OUT)
description:
This shirt represents the dreams we carry with us every day. Oven Fresh Dreams is much more than a baking, lifestyle company. It's a movement that embraces individuality & achieving anything we put our minds to. By wearing this shirt you're letting everyone know you're not afraid to take risks because you're a dreamer!
